cause.description:
This cause is to all those people on facebook who care about the world and others... This cause is for Human Rights not just for specific countries but all countries around the world that are war torn, poor,and have diseases. Please help put this to an end by donating and inviting friends!
1. "Poverty Shouldn't be a life sentence" --- Got it off a bill board
2. HEalth care IS a universal right
3. EVERYONE has their right to live.
cause.mission: To have those who care about others to make our world equal
cause.name: Human Rights and Relief All Over the world
